text: Silver Street is a railway station in Sterling Way, Edmonton in North London, close to Fore Street. The next station away from London is Edmonton Green and the next towards London is White Hart Lane. Trains terminate at Liverpool Street station in the City of London. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Railway stations in the London Borough of Enfield Category:London Travelcard zone 3 Category:Railway stations served by National Express East Anglia
title: Silver Street railway station
